verify(org.apache.http.HttpRequest, org..FullName: public abstract void verify (HttpRequest request, HttpResponse response, HttpContext context)

ClassDesc: Please use @B_java#net#URL#openConnection_E@ instead. Please visit Defines an interface to verify whether an incoming HTTP request meets the target server's expectations. The Expect request-header field is used to indicate that particular server behaviors are required by the client. A server that does not understand or is unable to comply with any of the expectation values in the Expect field of a request MUST respond with appropriate error status. The server MUST respond with a 417 (Expectation Failed) status if any of the expectations cannot be met or, if there are other problems with the request, some other 4xx status.
